Nice to work with a company that accomodates to YOUR schedule and provides customer support techs up front that actually know what they're doing without having to first work through a firewall of know-nothings asking you if your cords are all plugged in.  If the price on this product is a little higher than other comparable wifi cams, the excellent customer support makes it worth it.

Reviews.Title: Service after warranty  5 stars for tech help.  Product gets 3 stars.
Reviews.Author: Tom Weiss
Reviews.Content: Gary @wifibaby got me going even after knowing product was "old" and out of warranty ... with dispatch.  After the service call, he followed up with the pertinent settings so that I can reproduce should it get into trouble again.  Thanks Gary!

Reviews.Title: Just ok - then night vision failed after 2 days
Reviews.Author: Michael R. Spryn "bobbygolucky"
Reviews.Content: I'm a little suspect of all the 5 star reviews here. Setup was clunky (about as far from an apple like experience as you can get). But I'm a nerd, so I didn't need to phone for help. The web interface is junk as far as web applications go. The camera isn't HD (not that it claimed it was, but there is no excuse for that these days). But in general it worked, so I was ok with it. Then after 2 nights night vision completely failed. It wasn't just the automatic switching that failed, it didn't even work when I just switched it to 'On'.My Mom purchased this for us for our baby room. Returned it and bought the foscom 720p model which so far works much better, though I hear they also fail quite often. It seems the market is ripe for a high quality baby monitor. Even if I was willing to spend $400, there just isn't a GREAT one on the market.

Reviews.Title: great product support
Reviews.Author: perry teitelbaum
Reviews.Content: the support for the setup is great 1 slight problem with the camera is that it has like a 3 second delay but otherwise im very happy

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Momita SenGupta
Reviews.Content: Setting up WiFi Baby in your home is fairly easy but I needed some help setting up the system so that I could view my baby from external locations like my office.  Eric in tech support was incredibly patient and thorough, walking me through the process, step by step.  I can now check in on my baby from the office or from wherever I am.  This is a great product for working moms!

Reviews.Title: Amazing Customer Service
Reviews.Author: alisonjanel
Reviews.Content: I recently worked with one of the WiFiBaby technicians (Eric) who helped me get my nanny cam feature set up in addition to the in-home wifi. It was quick, easy and we had it done in less than 30 minutes! Love the quality of this product (especially the ability to access via my iOS devices), and the personalized experience and treatment I received when I was having troubles. Would definitely recommend to others!

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased with the Wifi Baby
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: After much research and reading many reviews of baby monitors, including the reviews here at Amazon, I finally decided on purchasing two Wifi Baby 2.0 monitors. They came promptly and all the parts were present.  The instructions were clear enough, but I am not a technical person. Out of caution as much as anything I went to the Wifi Baby website and filled out the form asking for help.  I was pleasantly surprised to receive a call a short time later from the company.The help I received from Wifi Baby was pleasant, complete and highly detailed. And did I mention pleasant? In clear American English. And free.  It was some of the best customer support I have ever received from any company. I can now see and hear my baby's room with great clarity in light or darkness, whether from within my home or remotely.I took awhile convincing myself to try something that would require an internet setup rather than the work-out-of-the-box systems sold at baby stores. But being able to check in when I am not home was very attractive to me. I'm glad I tried it.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING product once setup
Reviews.Author: RND
Reviews.Content: As with some of the other reviews, I completely agree that this product is fantastic. The video feed is clear (only about a 1-2 second delay) whether day or night. It's great the have the versatility to view from a phone, computer, tablet without any additional charges or gimmicks. The audio pick-up is extremely powerful as well. I was afraid of two things: 1) the video feed would keep breaking and 2)the audio would not be heard, but both these fears have been unfounded thus far. I also like how you can "close" the iPad app but still have audio running (becomes a default audio monitor).I initially wanted to rate this product as a 4* one because the only downside is that you do need some help setting it up completely (I would recommend setting something-up with customer service). However, I changed my mind to rate it 5*s because the customer service experience was easy, smooth, and flawless and I am all set. I put in a ticket online at the WIFIbaby web site, someone contacted me within a few hours to schedule a time and on the appointed day remotely took care of everything for me. It now works like a charm and we're considering purchasing a second cam.Expensive, but definitely worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service, Great Product
Reviews.Author: Natalie Monson "Natalie Monson"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this monitor for our third child as all of the other video monitors we have purchased (one for each of the previous children) broke.  On the old monitors it was always the monitor device that broke and not the camera, so I like that this doesn't even have a monitor device, we just use our iPhones & iPad.  The camera is very sturdy and works great.  The picture is great quality, and the sound is good enough for a baby monitor.  I read some reviews that the sound quality was not great on this monitor, and I think as long as you aren't expecting to be able to listen to music from your baby's room on your phone and have it be the same quality as in the room you probably won't be disappointed in the sound quality.  I did have to pay for the app to use this on my phone, but it was only $13 and covers all of our Apple devices.  I just factored that into the cost of buying the camera.I was initially able to get the monitor to work as long as our devices were connected to our home network but couldn't figure out the technicalities of getting it set up to work outside of our home network.  I filled out the customer service request form on Wifi Baby's site and was able to schedule a service appointment with Gary from Wifi Baby the same day.  He did a screen share and got everything set up perfectly for me.  It was an awesome customer service experience.  It really is very technical to set up the out of network viewing, so it was nice to have Gary just take over my computer and set it up for me.  I'm not tech savvy and trying to follow the instructions for the set up over the phone would have been very difficult.  I was really worried about not being able to get this to work based on other reviews, but it all works great after having customer service set it up for me.  Overall I really like this product, and the customer service at Wifi Baby is awesome!

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great tech support, worth the $$
Reviews.Author: liz
Reviews.Content: We chose the WiFi baby camera after some hesitation since our wifi connection at home is kind of slow, we are not very tech savvy, and it's more expensive than other cameras (i.e. DropCam).  It turned out to be one of the best big-ticket purchases we've made since having kids! Gary at tech support is awesome (cordial, efficient, and explains things in simple terms for the non-tech savvy). He helped set everything up in less than 1 hour and we now are in the process of purchasing a second WiFi Baby camera for another room.  The picture is clear, the sound quality is great, and we feel much better knowing what is going on at home while we are away.  Thanks Gary and thanks WiFi Baby!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera and Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Eddie Escobar
Reviews.Content: I have had three baby wifi's and have loved them. They are the best baby cams on the market in my opinion. Great customer service. Thanks baby wifi.

Reviews.Title: So simple grandparents can do it....
Reviews.Author: Harry Remshard
Reviews.Content: WiFi Baby (WFB2013) is awesome.  We're technologically challenged grandparents, but found the internal Wi-Fi setup and use of the recommended app very easy.  Establishing the external connection was a little more challenging and required an online appointment with technical support, but from the reviews I anticipated that would be necessary.  The technical service appointment, however, was easy to schedule and the tech was right on time.  One of the best customer service appointments I've had with any product.My Technical Representative was Eric.  He was extremely patient and his instructions very clear.  We did not do screenshare because of technical issues with the connection, but he was able to verbally walk me through the setup process in minutes.I highly recommend this product.  It is exactly what we wanted.  The product works flawlessly including my daughter's ability to connect remotely to view her sleeping infant while we're babysitting.  Picture and sound quality are great with very little delay.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Mobileops
Reviews.Content: Will not be disappointed.  Great product, great functionality, great service.  Look no further.  Unmatched in this market.  Far better than a limited device with a proprietary screen.

Reviews.Title: Great product - even better product support
Reviews.Author: Oliver Laurence
Reviews.Content: You want to know if something is going to go wrong that you aren't going to get the run around.  Gary at wifi baby was very responsive and followed through with helping us to get our issues resolved.  We had our first unit for about 3 months and a strange audio failure occurred so we contacted support.  Gary connected responded via email right away and then set up a call to troubleshoot the first product and quickly resolved that we needed a replacement.  It was nice not to have a hassle and they sent out another product right away (with the option to at least keep the first unit until we got the replacement since the video was operating)  and then Gary offered (and we accepted) to remote in with us and walk us through the set up so we had an even better install than what we had managed to do with our first unit.  We've only just installed the second unit so hopefully the audio issue was a fluke.  We really like the product and the flexibility of viewing the camera from all our computers/ipads/iphones and even the ability to monitor from the office.  The quality of view at night is much better than I expected.  There is a very minor delay, but that doesn't bother me at all. This product does everything I need it to.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Monitoring Device
Reviews.Author: seth mensah
Reviews.Content: Excellent product. Perfect image and sound quality.  The setup was not bad at all if you follow the step-by-step instructions from the setup video on the WiFiBaby.net website.

Reviews.Title: Gret Canera and help is available
Reviews.Author: Marcia Schneider
Reviews.Content: I purchased the WIFI Baby cam and tried to set it up myself. I could get it about half set up without having an advanced degree in technology. Lucky for us as users, the customer service is awesome. They set up appointments for nights and weekends that works great for me. I worked with Gary O, a tech supervisor, and he had me do a few things before our call so he could work efficiently with me. In about 1/2 hour we were in business. Great tech support.My only recommendation is that they should tell you before hand that you will probably need tech support to set this up, rather than getting frustrated trying to set it up yourself.By the way the camera is working great! It is located on the third floor and the wireless router is on the first floor and the signal is perfect

Reviews.Title: Amazing customer service!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star rating was for the difficulty of set up (without help) and the fact that it cannot be more mobile (meaning I couldn't use it at a rental condo at the beach or take it to a friends house for the day) once it's set up its there until you move and reset up your modom.Otherwise... It's awesome! Love the idea of seeing my girls if we are home or not.

Reviews.Title: Great service!!!
Reviews.Author: Carabambola
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with this product works amazingly. The only downside its installing it. It complicated, but I scheduled an appointment with a support team associate,his name was Eric, and in less than 24 hours I was using the camara on my PC and Samsung Galaxy II. Eric was awesome!!! Thanks wifibaby for a great product and service. I'll definitely recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Buy this camera
Reviews.Author: Fernanda Lopez Palacios "FERNANDA"
Reviews.Content: This camera is everything you are looking for!  Although the set up says easy, I defiantly wouldn't say it was easy but with the help of Errol from customer service I was able to set up all my phones and I'm extremely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Customer Support is TOP NOTCH
Reviews.Author: MichiganDad
Reviews.Content: WIFI baby certainly isnt the cheapest montior setup on the market. I'm also not very technically savvy so the setup was frustrating to me. I was able to get the camera working on my PC but not my android phone. I purchased the TinyCam Monitor Pro app and spent a few days trying to get it to work. I finally gave up and called customer support. Gary gave me a call back within 24 hrs and we set up a screen sharing session. He spent almost an hour on the phone working with me and got everything setup and working perfectly!!! He also sent me an email with all of the details of what he had done and all the info I needed to setup my wifes phone as well.I couldnt be happier with the product now that its all working correctly. BIG thumbs up to Gary @ WIFI Baby!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great customer service!
Reviews.Author: JB Bennett
Reviews.Content: Y-Cam works beautifully night and day. Setting up wifi connection was easy. I contacted customer service about remote (3G) viewing. They scheduled a screen sharing meeting and helped configure my unit to allow the remote viewing (nanny cam) within 20 minutes. Ask for Errol, he knows his stuff.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up on wifi.  Had some troubles getting the remote viewing set up, but the wifi tech support helped me on the phone after hours to get it working - and it is awesome!  The tech support was just unbelievable.  I would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product.
Reviews.Author: Lenna Poulatian
Reviews.Content: Great product and even better customer service.  The set up was easy and the tech at WiFi Baby walked us through the entire thing.Being able to access on our iPhones is very convenient and the quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Complicated, but worth the money and the time!
Reviews.Author: mariko_noelani
Reviews.Content: In reading all the reviews before we put this on our registry, we knew what we were getting ourselves into. Yes, we had the same experience as most....  a wonderful customer service experience!  We knew we would have to spend some time getting it all set up, but now that it is we love it.  Definately worth the money, time and cost of the "app" on iTunes.

Reviews.Title: Good device and great tech support
Reviews.Author: Amira Day
Reviews.Content: We had trouble getting the camera connected properly and accessing the video from outside our house.  Gary was so fast in responding to my request (even on a Saturday), explained the steps he was taking and why, and got us set up.  Thanks again Gary!

Reviews.Title: Good start so far
Reviews.Author: SFNeel
Reviews.Content: Just recently purchased 2 WifiBaby cameras. So far the cameras look and perform great.Previous reviews about the self-setup are correct in that it's is not an easy process to do on your own, even if you're pretty savvy. The tech support that helped me get both cameras set up correctly (Errol) was fantastic! Extremely helpful and knowledgable. Not to mention that he helped me on a Saturday morning. Thanks Errol.So if you're willing to live with the short term delay of setting up time with tech support, I recommend the product.Some bugs with the iPhone app but was able to solve those as well.

Reviews.Title: Customer service
Reviews.Author: lbaeyens
Reviews.Content: Gary at Wifi Baby customer service was extremely helpful in resolving the issues I experienced with the acces to my Wifi Baby camera from outside my network. He offered a swift, professional and comprehensive solution and because of his support I can now access the camera from anywhere.Thank you!!Luc

Reviews.Title: Impressive
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: It is possible to use a Web camera and to nearly the same thing, but the support from Errol and the functionality of the camera is exactly what you want. It can be protected as well.Can be used to see your child at work or on the go.

Reviews.Title: LOVE this camera! EXCELLENT support team!
Reviews.Author: Tricia1977
Reviews.Content: My husband travels a lot for work and with this camera he can watch our girls be tucked in at night! Also, if we have a date night we can watch my mom so the same. The clarity is great and the sound is very crisp. I had a little bit of a hard time setting the cameras up initially and Gary with their help team was AMAZING. In fact, I have needed his assistance a couple of times (I accidentally reset my router) and I simply emailed him and he got back to me right away... On a Sunday afternoon may I add! I watch the monitors on my iPad and my husband uses his iPhone. I also have the app on my iPhone (you just pay for the app once per iTunes acct) and I sometimes watch the nursery from that as well.I really love how you can dim the screen at night so it's not bright in the dark, the picture in picture if you have two cameras and the ability to zoom in.I heard about this camera from a friend and I have  recommended it to a few on my friends! I only have it 4 stars vs 5 because the computer part is a little confusing to me...but having the network support via Gary with wifi baby has made that part pretty simple.I will say (and it has never happened to me) that if your power or Internet goes out your cameras will as well. I could be wrong about this- but as far as I know this is true.

Reviews.Title: Great product!! Great service always!!!
Reviews.Author: IndieLover
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera over a year ago!! It has been my best friend since my baby was born! During this time I moved, and had new internet service, i wasn't very techy so I called wifibaby support! They called me back, walked me through the steps to get back up and running and I had my childs camera running again with no problem! I watch her from my iphone, ipad and even my work computer!!! It's the best! Customer service is friendly, and very helpful!!! I truly recomend their products! WifiBaby gets an A+++++ from a very satisfied customer!!! ME!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Technical Support!
Reviews.Author: Samuel Sihapong
Reviews.Content: My wife and I just purchased the WiFi Baby 2.0 combo pack. So far the interface with the iPhone and iPad has been good overall. The main features that attracted us was the remote feature. Setting up this feature was complicated, and required technical support. Errol Hunter was very instrumental in getting my cameras up and running. He was very professional and patient with me. We had a few unexpected obstacles that require special attention, but was able to troubleshoot through it.I give the product four stars because there are some areas of improvement, but I give Errol five stars for his technical skills and service.I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: ereader
Reviews.Content: After researching lots of wifi monitors we decided to go with wifi baby due to specifications that the other wifi monitors did not seem to have.The best thing about this monitor is that if you are somewhere that doesn't offer wifi, you can use your smart phone's 3G or 4G systemto view the baby.It did take some time setting it up to our computer and wifi system but if you are tech savvy you should have no issue.I did have a bit of trouble connecting our camera to our iPhone's 4G network but wifi baby's tech support was great.Errol was our tech and he was VERY helpful, polite, and accommodating. He took the time to pretty much do it for us (they use some program to take control over your computer and wifi system and just do the set up themselves...all I had to do was sit there). After, he took the time to explain everything back to me.I'm happy that we decided to purchase this monitor, we plan on going on vacation this summer and leaving the baby with a sitter so it's nice to havethe option to be able see him whenever we want.If you are searching for a wifi cam this is the one to get, I've read about the others like summer's and the specs don't even compare.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: Y. Chen
Reviews.Content: We have a little 6 month girl and what could be more important than making sure that we always have eyes to make sure she is safe.  We bought the WiFi Baby 2.0 and are using it with our Iphone and it works well.  Actually, we had issues at first but it turned out that it had nothing to do with our product and everything to do with our home setup.  When we called customer service, we ended up getting a guy named Errol (not sure if I'm allowed to mention his name but I'm going to) and he spent over an hour on the phone multiple times to solve the problem which had to do with a weak router and not this product.  We are very happy with this product and they definitely have the best customer service I've experienced in a long time.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Cblass
Reviews.Content: Sure it is a little overwhelming to setup but the support is amazing. You share your screen with them and the patiently walk through the entire setup. Its complex but its worth it for the functionality of monitoring your child from virtually anywhere from any device.

Reviews.Title: wifi baby back online
Reviews.Author: lacy
Reviews.Content: we have a lot of wifi problems at our house. everybody in the neighborhood has a strong wifi network and we're all using the same channels. often we get interference which slows down our speed for streaming or downloads.so, i was concerned about whether wifi baby would be fully functional. but, it is. the image of our baby in his crib is clear, night or day.after doing the initial set-up without tech support, my husband got the system working for us. we downloaded the app for our iphones/ipads (small charge for the app from itunes) and started using it constantly.it worked perfectly for two weeks until we had a power outage in the neighborhood. when the power came back on, wifi baby did not.luckily, we spoke to errol hunter in wifi baby tech support.he was a superstar. not only did errol make himself available for hours until we had time to call him back, but, he spent well over an hour setting up the system for us again and customizing it to our needs.it's working really well now and i believe we're set up so that next time the power cuts out (it does that regularly, where we live), wifi baby should be able to come back online without the same problems.even though i've only had wifi baby for a few weeks, it's already an indispensable element of our household baby gear.

Reviews.Title: WifiBaby works great!
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: We have been using wifibaby 2013 for a month and love it! The setup was easy and the ability to access the camera on our cell phones/computer/ipad is so convenient. The features with this camera are so intuitive. Being able to change to night vision at the press of a button or merely being set to auto works great. The auto recording with various settings is a plus and also has the ability to directly download to dropbox! Setting up remote viewing (outside our wifi network, like when I'm at work) was a little more involved but I was able to easily setup a screen sharing session with a technician, Eric, who was able to get everything setup easily even with a few router hiccups. GREAT SUPPORT, thank you! I think the only thing missing is the ability to move the camera remotely which would come in handy for home security use once our little guy is on the move!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Digital Monitor...Major headeaches in trying to set up BUT...Outstanding Customer Service that went above and beyond
Reviews.Author: chriscag
Reviews.Content: Tremendous product overall but MAJOR headaches in trying to get it set up.  I work in IT and could not get it to work to save my life.  After 2 days of trying, I gave up and submitted a ticket to their Customer service.  They literally called me back within 20 minutes and stayed on the phone until every last piece of the process worked.  I just can't imagine they could support this on a wide volume scale but am grateful they spent the time with me.  Absolutely love the monitor and the iPad application.

Reviews.Title: Support
Reviews.Author: Colin
Reviews.Content: I needed support to help me set up the Nanny Cam feature. The service was professional, helpful and informative. I got everything I needed in 15 minutes. I would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Nice product with good customer support
Reviews.Author: PotLukes
Reviews.Content: It took a bit of effort to get the camera set-up.  Luckily, the customer support was very good (thanks, Eric).  I tried to do the set-up myself but couldn't get it to work.  I contacted their customer support and they were able to schedule an online and phone appointment for two days later.  Support person was very professional and easy to work with.  Got me up an running and now the camera works fine.

Reviews.Title: Happy with it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The setup of the camera can be a little challenging but thankfully customer support was great and Errol helped us out on the weekend getting it set up. Overall happy with the camera. It's pretty cool that the grandparents can see the video or that we can see it from work. It works well with the Tinycam app.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: rlion
Reviews.Content: I purchased the camera a couple of months ago but I got stuck with the outside home wifi network setting.  I could set up home wifi easily but the other part requires you to now your way around routers, IP, etc.  This has nothing to do with the company, I just got very busy lately.  Finally, after a lot of complains from my wife, I reached out to WB's customers service last Saturday. They responded first thing on Monday.  I replied the same evening and Errol Hunter responded instantly that he was available (8.15pm) to help me on the spot.  He set up a screen sharing and set up my monitor.  He had to spend more than an hour chewing on it due to my old Verizon router but got the thing done with a smile.  My wife is now a happy spy.  thanks again for the hard work Errol

Reviews.Title: Good product and excellent support
Reviews.Author: HappyOwner
Reviews.Content: Purchased the WifiBaby 2.0 couple days ago and had some problem in the setup process. The vendor's technical support was excellent in guiding me through the installation process. Now, the system is running and it lives up in all aspects of the system operation as advertised. I would recommend to anyone to purchase this product.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Jessica Erdrich
Reviews.Content: I bought the WiFi Baby as a security camera. I can see what is going on at my house whenever I want and record when I need to.  Gary at the customer service was very professional and helped me get up and running!

Reviews.Title: WiFi Baby Review
Reviews.Author: kmoran75
Reviews.Content: Could not be more pleased with the support help offered by Wifi Baby.  The initial set up was easy, but I needed help with port forwarding. I contacted Wifi Baby on Saturday at 5:00 PM EST, and received an email back within a hour asking me what time would work with my schedule!!! I selected Sunday at 4:00 PM EST, and within 30 minutes my two cameras are working on our WIFI network as well as outside on a 3G/4G network.  THANK YOU GARY!!

Reviews.Title: Bradvis
Reviews.Author: bradis
Reviews.Content: Just got the WiFi baby so still too early to rate the product but the service was exceptional. The technician Errol quickly resolved the problem (Security monitoring system) and changed the camera to run on a different frequency. My advice - is don't spend too much time trying to connect if it does not work immediately, fill out the form and get Errol to solve the issue quickly and efficiently with a very friendly demeanor.CheersChris

Reviews.Title: Wifibaby Review
Reviews.Author: Tasha
Reviews.Content: I have had my two cameras for two years now and don't know what I would do without them. I have used both apps on my kindle fire and iphones without any issues. Technical and customer service for Wifibaby is stellar!! Gary did an excellent job helping me setup my cameras. The only reason I gave it a 4 star and not a 5 is because the setup can get a little tricky for the technically challenged individual.

Reviews.Title: baby monitor wifi
Reviews.Author: lauren10ma
Reviews.Content: The monitor works well as far as i can tell. picture is great, about a second delay in sound but over all it is good. Errol helped me out and did a fantastic job, it took no time at all and he knew everthing he was doing no questions asked.

Reviews.Title: The best !
Reviews.Author: Northern MI
Reviews.Content: Extremely easy to set up in the home ! Out of home (iPhone/ipad) took quite awhile to get it to work. Seriously I would just call customer service, they are some of the best people I've ever experienced from any company. The price of this set up is worth it just for that ! Errol, who helped me, did in 15 minutes what I couldn't do in 3 hrs. Now my wife and I (and our extended family all over the US) can check in on the guy without bothering him.

Reviews.Title: Hopefully we love this!??
Reviews.Author: Gena M. Destefani
Reviews.Content: We just recently bought the wifi baby.Here is what to watch out for:The quick guide is a little confusing...and is geared towards Mac users.  Once I got it set up, i went to see if it worked on our iPad, and you do have to buy the wifi baby app for $12.00 for all your devices.  But, we really wanted this for the convenience of taking it with us or watching when we're not home.  Our baby isn't here yet, so I gave it 4 stars for now!

Reviews.Title: The product is solid and the customer service exceptional...
Reviews.Author: missT
Reviews.Content: We have the Wifi Baby and really like it. I've never used any other monitors so have no point of reference to compare it to. Here's what I like:Multiple places for viewing...yes you have to buy the app for viewing but my wife and I can both watch our son independently on our iPhones. At night before we go to bed we also pull him up on our laptop because you can also view from a computer. At night we have one of those alarm-clock speaker phone chargers where we dock our phone. The sound goes to the speakers and we keep the video up all night (with the new app update you can dim the video of your baby) while our phone is being charged.The customer service is amazing...unfortunately I feel like we've all been desensitized to the fact that our experience with customer service will be horrible (or at least my pessimistic view on it), but the Wifi Baby customer service is what all customer service should be. Gary called me 45 minutes after I had sent a request via email in a window of time I specified. He spent over an hour with me setting up everything. He was smart, knowledgable and incredibly helpful. I like to think I'm pretty good on a computer but because of Gary he helped enhance the Wifi Baby experience cluing me in on things I hadn't figured out or thought of setting.Definitely recommend. Solid well put together product with a customer service above and beyond anything I've ever experienced.

Reviews.Title: WiFi Baby
Reviews.Author: Chris R
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. It was extrmeley easy to setup (assuming someone can read a quick setup guide) and was working in 5 minutes. My wife and I enjoy being able to view the camera through the iPad (or iPhone) and not have to carry another device around with us.  The streaming is great and works perfectly.  I did speak with Gary in regards to setting up the camera to view from my office.  Gary did a great job and was extremely helpful.  I would recommend this camera to anyone and will be purchasing another when my wife and I have another baby.

Reviews.Title: Great Babycam
Reviews.Author: nick1282
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera after a recommendation from our friend.  Our friend would pull up the app on their phone when visiting us and show us their baby.  Pretty cool right?  The camera shipped quickly and set up is not that bad once you follow their directions online.  I did have an issue setting up the "away" feature (able to view outside of your homes wifi network), and support called me the next day to personally walk me through the process.  I would just say, that the lag time can be 10 seconds or more, when you are viewing the camera outside of your network.  This will depend on your phone service of course.  You could always hook up to your work/cafe wifi for better results!  All in all - great purchase, and even better cust. service!

Reviews.Title: Great monitor
Reviews.Author: Swag88
Reviews.Content: We have used a 2012 version and just got 2 of the 2013 versions.  Love them.  They give crisp clear pics in both light and dark.  Other reviewers have thought the 4 quadrant screen is too small, i dont agree, and it only takes a tap to enlarge the feed from any camera.  The setup of viewing from in the house (on the same wifi network) is a piece of cake.  External viewing can be more difficult, but I had help setting up our 2012 version so setup for me took less than 15 minutes to setup both.  The audio is fine for us, also we have white noise in our children's rooms and can still hear crying over the white noise without an issue.  the iPad/iPhone app works great with tons of options for viewing and background audio even after the app has close.  Customer service is top notch, available even at night and weekends to assist with device setup and trouble shooting.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: eswart82
Reviews.Content: We received our wifi baby 2.0 yesterday and we think it's great! We had issues getting the away feature set up and Gary from support did a great job helping me set it up at 9:30 pm. It all set up and running, we are spying on our dogs while we are at work  until our little guy comes. Great Product and Great Service! Thinking about getting one more for home monitoring!

Reviews.Title: Great wifi cam
Reviews.Author: Jasko
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. We did a lot of research for a great baby camera and somehow we found this wifi baby about 2 years ago now. The camera works great and we use it on our iPhone and iPad. My parents live in Europe and it is easy even for them to watch their grandson whenever they want(we did have to give them the password for the wifibaby). I have sent several parents to this website and I would recommended it to anybody. Every time I have had any issues with the camera(I changed internet providers) I did have to contact their support to help me out and Gary helped me both times. He is GREAT and he remember me the 2nd time around. Great camera and great video quality.

Reviews.Title: $12 for app to view baby and complicated set up
Reviews.Author: Kelly Warner
Reviews.Content: I bought this monitor because of the amazing reviews and was extremely disappointed. It is SO complicated to set up. Also, they charge $12 to download the app. So... on top of how much it costs for the unit we ended up spending $36 so my nanny, myself and my husband could download the app to see it. That's ridiculous. It should be free for at least 2 users to see their baby.It's also not quick to see the baby. You open the app and you have to login and then it takes some time to connect to the monitor. I wanted something so if I was away or up in the middle of the night and I could heck on my baby quickly.For me it's just not worth it. I would rather get a non wifi one. I guess if you are constantly away from your baby and out of range for a normal monitor it would be nice to check in, but even then I think there are probably better ones out there than this. I plan on returning it.

Reviews.Title: exactly what we needed
Reviews.Author: NavyBabyMomma
Reviews.Content: My husband is in the navy and we wanted a way for him to be able to see our son while he's away and this monitor is awesome for that, and for simply moving around the house and being able to keep an eye on my little one.I had some issues with it working wirelessly but after filling out a support ticket I was given a call the same day by one of the tech support and we discovered that it wasn't the monitor at all, but my internet provider's issue. He also helped me set it up so that my husband could watch the feed from his phone while not at home- which is something I didn't know was a separate set up. I love WiFi baby, it's well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Avoid, Avoid, Avoid!!!!  Trust me on this one... read my experience.
Reviews.Author: hgp2013
Reviews.Content: I've never reviewed a product online but I felt it was necessary to share my experience with mom's considering this product.  I was very excited about a wifi monitor... how cool, right?  Wrong.  I think it's a great idea in theory, but they still have a lot of kinks to work out and the customer service has been less than helpful.  First I spent, $259 on a baby monitor when a $120 video monitor would've been fine.  When you set up the product, you have to download the app, which they charge you another $12 for.  When you spend that much money on a monitor, shouldn't the app be free???  We had to spend $12 for each download... my phone, my husband's phone (he has a different iTunes account), and then our nanny's phone.  Another $36 just to get the monitor to work... ridiculous.Set up was less than easy, though I will say their tech support is helpful.  The real bummer here is no one is available to help you on demand.  You have to set up an appointment which is typically 24 hours out.  Once we got the monitor up and running, it didn't work well.  It constantly cut out, but I was still jazzed on the best of the best baby monitor so I figured it was a problem on our end.  I spent $199.99 on a new modem, which didn't solve the problem.  So then I spent another $199.99 on the best wireless router, which (you guessed it) didn't solve the problem  either.  I then paid $50 to have my internet provider come out and install an internet outlet closer to our bedroom.  Problem. Still. Not. Solved.  So, I've spent a grand total of $745 trying to get my monitor to work.  At this point, I'm feeling rather foolish but I just deal with a monitor that cuts in and out (which is scary when you wake up in the middle of the night and your monitor is blacked out... and you have no idea for how long).FAST FORWARD 7 MONTHS....I am going to bed a week and a half ago and the monitor won't work on my phone.  So I try to pull it up on the iPad... no luck.  I try for 30 minutes to get it to work and then give up and hope it comes back on in the middle of the night (this has happened before).  The next morning (Friday), I set up a time for tech support to diagnose the problem, which will be the next day (Saturday).  The tech support guy (who is very helpful, by the way) tells me that the monitors wifi capabilities have crapped out and I need a new monitor... after 7 months.  You have got to be kidding me!  Isn't the whole point of a "wifi" monitor that it works with your wireless internet connection???  He sends me the information to get a new monitor, which is covered by my warranty.  I complete all the necessary paperwork and submit my credit card number for a $200 refundable deposit to have my new monitor expedited since at this point I have been without it for 3 days.  Monday comes and goes... I hear nothing.  On Tuesday, the returns department starts hassling me about my warranty.  I respond and provide as much information as possible the same day.  I hear nothing back, so on Wednesday I send a follow up email asking if my new monitor has shipped.  I hear nothing so I call and leave a message and then email my tech support guy begging for his help.  On Thursday I receive an email (my call went unreturned) stating it's not their intention to cause frustration but they are still having problems with my warranty.  As a good faith, they ship my replacement monitor overnight to me.  That would be great and all if I hadn't paid for an expedited replacement 6 DAYS EARLIER!!!!  CUSTOMER SERVICE IS A JOKE!!!!!  Aside from the tech support guy, I am beyond frustrated with the lack of timely responses from their returns department.  I wish I could just return the replacement camera and by a regular video monitor.Another downfall of the monitor is if you receive an Outlook calendar invite or reminder on your phone, that overrides the monitor which means the invitation stays up on your phone and the monitor cuts out.  Very frustrating as I am business professional and use Outlook to organize my life.  I can't tell you how many times I have woken up and the monitor has been blank, which is terrifying as a first time parent.This has just been my experience.  I would strongly recommend going in another direction.  I wouldn't recommend this product to anyone.  My feeling is anyone who has rated this product with 3 or more stars hasn't had it very long and they will be in my shoes in a few short months.  Save yourself the hassle... you have too many other things to be worried about.

Reviews.Title: Good product, great customer service
Reviews.Author: Charles Kim
Reviews.Content: This is an absolute great product.  Very versatile and has many options to set it up the way you like it.  It can take some figuring out to get everything completely configured.  But using their customer service was a great experience.  They are very kind and helpful and got me up and running very quickly for in home and remote viewing.It is a little pricey, but I think it's worth it to keep an eye on your little one!

Reviews.Title: Not good if you own a Mac
Reviews.Author: Joe "joe"
Reviews.Content: The setup app for Mac freezes every time for me, making it impossible to setup. It should not be this difficult to setup, and their app looks like it was designed by an 8th grader as a school project. It baffles me how this has such good ratings. I'm glad this was a gift, because I would be very upset if I actually bought this junk.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly in Europe!
Reviews.Author: Cristian Sirbu
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my family in Europe (Romania). We were able to set it up very quickly on the WiFi network inside the house.Very satisfied with the image quality. On the computer, image has about 5 seconds delay, and on the iPhone/iPad only 3-4 seconds delay. This was on a very fast internet connection (as Romania is in top 5 worldwide in internet speed). Setting up the remote viewing was very challenging. My brother in law and me, we consider ourselves pretty good with computers but we were still not able to do it. International call to tech support in USA was very expensive so we waited until i got back to US. I contacted tech support as soon as i got back and they were very nice! Especially mr. Gary Olson. He set up a 3 way screen sharing  and audio with me in US, my brother in law in Romania and him. It took us 30-45 minutes but he was very professional and knowledgeable and everything was set up correctly and works good. Now i am able to just type in an address on my computer or iPhone/iPad and see my niece in Romania, 5.000 miles away! Awesome product! Challenging to set up but you'll not regret it!

Reviews.Title: Just what we were looking for
Reviews.Author: djwtarheel
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera to monitor our children with our nanny. As other reviewers have noted, the camera definitely is a bit challenging to get up and running (must do port forwarding to get to work on cell phones when you're outside of your home network). However, they do offer excellent technical support. I worked with Gary O. to get mine going and he was excellent - friendly, knowledgeable, and patient. He also offered to assist me in the future if I have any further issues going forward.The camera itself does have a good picture and decent audio, but there is a slight delay again as other reviewers have noted. I appreciate the ability to record onto a microSD card OR on your cell phone (you must purchase a separate app for your peripheral devices - $3.99 for android and $11.99 for iphone).  If you are in the market for a good camera, I'd recommend this one. Just know you will likely need some assistance (most people anyway)and know in advance that you will need to purchase an app for outside of your network viewing.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, top notch technical support if needed.
Reviews.Author: Jason Rutledge
Reviews.Content: Getting ready to be a father for the first time, I know personally I want nothing but the best to keep an eye an ear on my baby. Researched and researched for easily a month for all the best must have's for the safety in the house. Decided with other reviews and high ratings to go with Wifi Baby 2.0. Needless to say i am very happy with that decision. Received my camera and did not want to waste a moment to set it up and test it. Directions are straight forward and easy for any Mac of PC owner. I did have a minor issue with setting up the nanny cam feature, which allows me to watch on my I-Phone or a computer outside my home network. (Which is a fantastic feature on this camera). I came to the conclusion I needed help with setting the camera up 100%.  Located on the website for Wifi Baby is a support tab that answers and shows you troubleshooting areas if it happens, let alone you can ask for live technical support over the phone or even with a share screen session. I filled out the information needed for support and within minutes I was called by Gary "Technical Guru", asking if he could finish my setup. Gary took over on the screen share session on my computer, very knowledgable and very patient Gary helped me with my issues, non camera related but how I had my home network set up with an addition modem not needed,  and had my camera up and operational from outside my network. Thank you Wifi Baby and Gary for a great product and customer service.

Reviews.Title: Best Customer Service in the World!!! Great Camera Too!
Reviews.Author: Staci Marie Lawrence
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing company. They have instant responses on social media, great customer service - they will walk you thru any problems you have setting up or resetting the camera and apps...the camera is great. It's so awesome to be able to login and see the baby sleeping when i'm out of town. It's great to have it on the ipad and our phones.WE LOVE THIS! Other monitors do not compare.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: Mere57
Reviews.Content: We got the WIFI-baby and set up the camera (that was real easy) and the App, but was unable to view the camera off the home wifi. I filled out the the service request portion on the support website, and was quickly given a meeting request time. once I joined the meeting that was set up in advance, Errol Hunter got the camera set to view remotely. He took the time to answer follow up questions that I had. it was a good experience. I would recommend this product !

Reviews.Title: Great, Fast, Reliable and Amazing Cust Service
Reviews.Author: CWeed
Reviews.Content: I have done a lot of research before purchasing one of these monitors.  I ultimately went with the WiFi Baby 2.0 cam.  Right out of the box, and I'm okay with computers and networking but far from an expert, I was able to get everything up and running for in home connection.  The only issues I had was connecting outside my network.  I emailed Gary at wifi baby and in the same day was responded to and called.  We screen shared and he then walked me through how to correctly set outside network connection.  Took less than 10 minutes and everything was done.  I then called my mother in a different state and was able to walk her through the process of connecting through the internet and she was able to connect with no problem.  I highly recommend this product for the ease of use and the AMAZING customer service I received from this company and from reading other reviews I am definitely not the only person to get this customer service.  Gary thank you so much and I will absolutely tell anyone looking for a baby monitor system to look into this product and buy it.

Reviews.Title: Love this...once it's up and running
Reviews.Author: C&C2013;
Reviews.Content: Had Errol help connect my wifi/3G which he made very easy!  Now it's working and even my Hubby can take a peek at how the baby is doing during the day while he is away at work!

Reviews.Title: The good and the bad
Reviews.Author: melissa levy
Reviews.Content: I am happy with this product now, but it wasnt as simple to get this product working as it should be.To begin, I followed the "10 step" quick start-up guide provided, but my camera still didn't work. There are several CRUCIAL steps in order to make the product work that aren't listed in the guide.Second, when the product wasnt working it was difficult to get in touch with customer service. I grew increasingly frustrated that there was only an automated voicemail and that I couldn't speak to someone immediately. I had to wait for them to contact me.The good news was that when I finally did get paired up with a technician I was given the help required in an efficient manner. Errol was fantastic and more than helpful. He quickly went on my computer to add the information required to make the product work. He also made sure the iPhone and iPad settings were correct and then He emailed me all of the information so that I had it as back up.I am very happy with the camera both aesthetically and technically. I can check in on my little guy while on the go and it gives me piece of mind.I hope the owners see this review and make changes to the guide to include all of the steps necessary to set up this product.

Reviews.Title: STOP LOOKING- THIS IS THE RIGHT ONE TO GET!
Reviews.Author: TStorm
Reviews.Content: After researching which wifi camera to get, it came down to this being the best option for my husband and I for a number of reasons, the most important being:1. We can access the camera via each of our iPhones, iPads, MacBook & PC.2. We currently only have/need 1 camera, however, in the future we can access multiple cameras on a single device with split screens without having to have a separate device or app for each different camera, this was really the biggest deal breaker for us.3. The customer support reviews were very favorable.Upon receiving the camera, I was very anxious to get it all set up, which was very easy given the installation disc and setup instructions. I was immediately pleased with everything about the camera: a. The sleek look of the camera b. The functionality of being able to move the camera around easily from room to room as needed, or the capability to mount it if so desired. c. The great picture quality in light and dark rooms d. The included ethernet cable (for setup) as I didn't have a spare one kicking around.Everything was perfect, until I realized that I was not able to view my camera externally, from outside of our network or on 3G. So then I went about reading their troubleshooting guide till I felt I had it all memorized and yet nothing had worked.  I then submitted a trouble ticket and had a response within JUST HOURS!!I ended up being helped by, Errol, who is an outstanding support technician! I opted for my assistance to be via remote screen support and Errol got right to work and within minutes he figured out the issue that was preventing my being able to view our camera externally.  It really had nothing to do with Wifi Baby being overly complicated (as I've read in some other reviews), it was really the way our ISP set up our router(s) on our property.  I called my ISP to have them reconfigure some of my settings and Errol waited VERY PATIENTLY on the line for an HOUR back and forth. Unfortunately, I wasn't able to resolve my configuration issues right away so I had to contact Errol again a couple days later when I had things in order.Once I contacted Errol to finish my setup, he connected remotely to my screen again and within 10 minutes, he had my external viewing set up on my computer and on my phones! This experience was so incredibly outstanding, it truly puts the SUPPORT in customer support! Did I mention the awesome hours that they are available to assist? Well, I am pretty sure they are available to help well into the evening, perhaps 9PM? Errol really was a pleasure to deal with and I would certainly refer every single one of my friends/family to purchase this product, if nothing other than for the outstanding one on one true customer support available to you, if you need it!DEFINITELY choose this camera, I'm sure glad we did!P.S.There is a separate third party app to purchase (I think $11.99) that works with this camera, however, it is not mandatory so if that is really a deal breaker for you then keep that in mind.  Personally, I like the app and think that it's ease of use is well worth the money, but again, not mandatory.

Reviews.Title: Great customer support!
Reviews.Author: totally_me4463
Reviews.Content: This product is hard to set up, but luckily, the company has great customer support. Thanks to the quick response and help from WIFI baby customer support, I was able to get my camera up and running in no time! Thanks to Errol M Hunter from WIFI baby customer support for the awesome help.

Reviews.Title: Best wifi baby camera option out there
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: Setup: Initial setup is easy.  Wifi monitoring is easy to set up on your home network.  Getting it set up to monitor away from home (when you're not on your home network) is challenging to do on your own, but if you get Errol's help, it takes just a few minutes.  The setup manual should just say "set up camera on home network, then enter a ticket request, then wait for Errol to call".Monitoring: Delay is better than other cameras.  Wish they had a dedicated monitoring unit.  Since there is no dedicated monitoring unit for use at home, you have to use your phone, tablet or computer.  Not sure yet if that will cause the battery to run down faster.  I do like that when monitoring on your phone, it overrides the sleep functions so it will monitor through the night.  The monitor viewing is free on the computer and the Droid app is free, but the iPhone/ iPad app that works with this camera is expensive.  Unfortunately we have 3 different iTunes accounts, so for us to get it on all of our devices, it was a bit pricey.Bottom line: For a baby monitor that allows us to peek in when we are not at home, this is the best option out there.

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny..Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Graceland977
Reviews.Content: Every parents' must have and top of the list. For being a worried parents, I love the feature where my husband and i both can sneak a peak with our little guy when We are at work or when We miss him when he is sleeping and don't wanna disturb him. The set up was easy,  but I recommend calling tech support for help. Gary made the installation way easier and quicker for me especially I'm not a tech savvy. Great customer service!!! Wifi Baby works best with the app "baby monitor Hd" on my iPhone. It's pricey but anything for my precious little guy and my peace of mind is worth it!!

Reviews.Title: AMAZING PRODUCT!!!
Reviews.Author: BabyDaddy
Reviews.Content: Looked all over the web for the best camera about a month before our little one was born.  The only negative things people had to say about this camera was that it was a little confusing to set up. Turned out to be no problem.  Setup for seeing the camera on my home network was super easy - just followed the instructions. Have used it as our baby monitor ever since. I just have the iphone app and keep it sitting on the nightstand the way I always have.  Wanted to set up remote viewing so I could check in from work.  Contacted customer support by email, got an immediate reply, set up screen sharing session for the following evening, and support talked me through each and every step until it was working.  Later bought additional cameras, and received the same amazing customer support.  Can watch our baby from work and see what she is up to, iphone and ipad apps work perfectly. COuld not be any happier with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: product is great
Reviews.Author: izilda
Reviews.Content: Recebi no tempo correto, o produto é exatamente o que eu queria, e a negociaçao foi perfeita, a embalagem estava intacta.REcomendo o site e tambem o produto.

Reviews.Author: RxJunkie
Reviews.Content: Wonderful product and wonderful tech-support.  Wifi cameras don't get much easier than this.  Enjoy!!Make sure to take advantage of Wifi Baby's awesome customer support if you have any issues with setup.

Reviews.Title: Incredible customer service/tech support
Reviews.Author: cara w meinke
Reviews.Content: I am shocked. I wanted to set up my Wifi Baby to view my baby from outside our home wifi network so I could see my 7 month old on the go if away. This is a pretty tricky ordeal, and I'm fairly tech savvy. It involves "port forwarding" and other such fun. I called the tech support phone number thinking they would just forward me to a website that would go over how to struggle through it myself. Instead I got a personal call back *ON A SATURDAY* from a support person who was awesome - he remotely logged in to my computer and ran through the entire set up from start to finish and it took 27 minutes! He then sent a follow up email that detailed everything we did so if I mess it up in the future I know how to fix it. A+ experience - would highly recommend this product just from a customer service standpoint alone!

Reviews.Title: Wanted it to be easier
Reviews.Author: castleitems
Reviews.Content: I was really looking forward to this product for the first time leaving the kids with a babysitter. Unfortunately I can't set up external monitoring no matter how much i try following the instructions. I can do it at home but can't connect outside.

Reviews.Title: Best cameras on the market!
Reviews.Author: Drsekelaky
Reviews.Content: After a lot of research and trial and error, these are the best cameras on the market! The tech support is superior!!!! Thanks so much Gary.Please update App to get full screen view on 5S

Reviews.Title: Great camera awesome support
Reviews.Author: Emily Shea Zarbatany
Reviews.Content: This camera works great!!!The mounting bracket is a also a good idea. I purchased 2. It looks like most other cameras need to be placed on a flat surface which seems difficult if your baby is in a crib.Set up for at home wi-fi was easy and works great.It was a little more difficult to use the remote access feature. I filled out the support request form and was contacted immediately. I corresponded with Gary and set up a time to talk. Gary's call was prompt and he got me up and running remotely in minutes.Great product awesome support.Thanks

Reviews.Title: WiFi image never worked!!!
Reviews.Author: Leonardo Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Never got image outsite of my house and at home tha video always had a delay big enough to be a problem.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the cost
Reviews.Author: AlaskaGrown
Reviews.Content: I received this as a present after my 2nd baby.  We previously had a Mobi video monitor which worked fine.  The unit was outdated however and we weren't able to add an extra camera.After my husband got this running (he is very computer literate and it took him almost 4 hours to get it to work) it seemed ok.  Decent picture, good sound.  Then I noticed the monitor would blink in and out - sometimes for a few seconds and sometimes for several minutes before logging back in.  We have the fastest internet connection we can get and our house is about 1600 sq. feet.  Needless to say I didn't trust this monitor at all. If I fall asleep there is no way to know if the monitor will blink out and I won't hear the baby.  Also have to keep my iphone or ipad plugged and and can't use it for anything else otherwise I can't see the baby.  Not practical.  After reading all of the positive reviews it seems as if they are reviewing the customer service, not the monitor.We are returning this and getting a nice monitor with two cameras, no setup and more bells and whistles for the same price.  Not worth the aggravation or the money.

Reviews.Title: Great baby monitor. Great technical support
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: This monitor is great. I have to admit, the set up is frustrating, however I just recommend setting up a technical ticket and getting Gary to help set it up. He access your computer remotely and does everything for you. He is fast, efficient and kind. He got me rocking and rolling. Great product. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: The tech support speaks english!
Reviews.Author: Teresa Penza
Reviews.Content: I spent a lot of time searching for one of the top baby monitors.  I read the reviews and decided to purchase the WiFi Baby.  Everything I read in the review was correct.  Takes a bit of work to get the remote access but the tech support was A+.  Eric sent me an email when I requested support.  He gave me a time frame that he was available.  We arranged that he would call me at 4:30 PST to program my camera.  He was running a few minutes late and sent me an email letting me know.  Eric was very patient, knowledgeable and he spoke ENGLISH!I would recommend this baby monitor. Even though the set up is a little involved, the outcome is worth it.  I can see my baby on my ipad, iphone and pc at home or away.  Audio and picture is excellent.  The sleek design is very attractive and looks cute in the baby room.

Reviews.Title: support
Reviews.Author: Zachary J Crosby
Reviews.Content: The tech support is not like the usual support in the way of calling and sitting and waiting for your turn to get help. We love this product but of course with any technology like it, it has it's bugs every once in a while. I set up a time on their website for a tech support call and sure enough, they called... well maybe 30 mins later than requested but who's counting? Gary was able to figure out the problem within minutes and solved the problem.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Network support
Reviews.Author: Pmyers20
Reviews.Content: After replacing my router I was having problem re configuring my wifi baby. Errol Hunter was very professional and a tremendous help with getting everything set back up and troubleshooting. Not only is this a great product, it has an excellent support team if you ever have a problem. I would recommend this product to anyone with a baby.

Reviews.Title: Really liking this product
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: We purchased two of these cameras. Initially, we had some trouble getting one of them set up, but tech support from Errol was fantastic, and now things are running smoothly.

Reviews.Title: Best Product and Customer Service Ever!!!
Reviews.Author: angie
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these cameras and it was the best money I have spent.  I searched all over for the best baby monitor and I finally found it.  They were easy to setup for home viewing.  Setting up for external viewing (nannycam) took a little more time.  Eric from WIFI Baby was absolutely great.  He did a screen share with me and called me and had them set up within 30 minutes.  It is so nice to finally find a great product and have great American customer service to support it.  The pictures are clear. I would definitely recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent customer service
Reviews.Author: btrcp27
Reviews.Content: Awesome product, we can see our baby in the monitor on our iPhones and iPad wherever we are. I only gave it 4 stars just bc of a couple of technical issues we've encountered. However, customer service is awesome. Gary walked me through every step and got it working again in no time.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Taylor M
Reviews.Content: This is a great baby monitor if you would like external viewing or want an all-in-one product with your phone/iPad/computer. The setup for the local viewing is easy and pretty straight forward. The external viewing is not so easy. Normally this would be a deterrent to buying the product, but the Wifi Baby customer support team is outstanding. I set up a call with Gary, who was extremely flexible with accommodating my schedule, and we knocked it out in no time. He was very knowledgeable about the product and zipped through the steps to get me up and running. Highly highly recommend this product, mainly because of the support offered.

Reviews.Title: What a great device and even better support!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: What else do I need to say?  The camera works as described.  The app is great!  The support is exceptional.  If you are in the market, your search stops here.

Reviews.Title: wifi baby
Reviews.Author: RM
Reviews.Content: This product is pretty neat and was a little hard to set up. I was able to get the camera working but when the camera was on no one could use the WiFi. I called the hotline and left a message and 15 mins later they called me back. Mr. Olsen was awesome!!!! He set my whole system up and got us up and running. His knowledge of the product was awesome and he explained things in a way I could understand. It was nice to talk to someone who cared and went above and beyond to make sure I was happy with the product. I didn't give it 5 stars because there is some choppy video at times. It could just be my WiFi but I was expecting steady streaming.

Reviews.Title: Good product but can be unreliable
Reviews.Author: Lindsay P.
Reviews.Content: I could not be more disappointed in a product considering the cost. I have been trying for 2 nights to get this to work and all it says is "reconnecting" on the screen, then it will turn on for 5 seconds and "reconnect" again. I also woke up one night at 3 am and the app had just shut off. I panicked, ran to my sons room and from then on have had to have him sleep in our room. I would get a different product or just go with the standard non video monitor, this one is dependent on apps and Internet.Update :I updated my review to 3 stars considering I wrote the above review in the middle of the night not able to see my sleeping baby. It turns out I needed to unplug my wireless and re plug in and it started working again. My husband and I are still going to purchase a normal plug in, voice monitor as a back up which is disappointing considering the cost of this video monitor.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Service!!
Reviews.Author: DocJPB
Reviews.Content: The cameras themselves are excellent. There is a very clear picture, with sound, in both light and dark rooms. The setup, however, can be tricky if you're not very good with computer routers, IP addresses, ports, etc (like me). HOWEVER, The service staff available, especially Gary, is amazing. Any day of the week, including Sunday, they are available. Gary patiently walked me through each step of the setup (2 cameras to 2 iPhones, a MacBook and an iPad) explaining what was being done along the way. He is easily the best computer technician we have ever dealt with. Afterwards, not only did my cameras work perfectly, but I had a better understanding of how the process worked. 30 minutes later I had a detailed email outlining the session, an email that I could easily refer back to if need be. This type of service makes the already good product that much better.

Reviews.Title: we love it
Reviews.Author: Mary C. Garrison
Reviews.Content: first time mom--kinda Type A, kinda laid-back. but we've loved this monitor. i had some concerns based on some of the reviews and while they're not wrong--it just hasn't bothered me.what some other reviewers were unhappy about:the time delay: yes, there is a 2-ish second delay. this doesn't bother me. our baby is almost 4 months old and has been sleeping in his own room now for about 6 weeks. at this point he's strong enough and a consistent-enough sleeper that there is some predictability about him. i check on my iphone, i watch for a few seconds and i put it down. i don't leave it on. i also can mostly hear him from anywhere in the house (except the kitchen) so that could be part of it. maybe if your nursery was down a long hall or something you might worry more? but for me i listen for him and check in on him intermittently. i also try not to be panicky or worried all the time--not an easy task for a new mother--but if you are someone who gets anxious and worries a lot maybe the delay would be a bigger problem?the set-up: you will probably need some help. its complicated. but we called the customer service people, who called right back, walked us through it and it works. we have to quit the app fairly frequently and restart it, i will say that. that is my least-favorite thing and why i gave it 4 stars instead of 5. and we also can't travel with it. we have a family beach trip coming up and are going to buy another (cheap) monitor for it because to go through all that twice more is too much to deal with.the great things!:--the cameral quality is really great. the night vision is so much better than i would have thought, and in the day time its color and you can see pretty much everything.--the sound is great. i love the squiggly line at the bottom (what is that called?) so if you can't hear well (over AC or a fan or something) you can see if there was an increase in sound in the room. really helpful.--love that its on our phones! i really didn't want to drag around another item all day and now i don't have to. i always have my phone with me so its always at the ready. and my husband travels for work and can check in on him wherever he is (depending on his iphone/ipad's connection) which he LOVES. that was the main reason we wanted this and its been wonderful.overall we've loved it. not perfect, expensive, but its a great monitor.

Reviews.Title: It's a relabeled Y-cam selling for twice as much.
Reviews.Author: Trevor Standley
Reviews.Content: Requires a $5-12 3rd party app (there is no first party app, and the wifibaby website points to 3rd party apps). These apps will work with any IP camera.The website mentions that there will be a 3-5 second delay in the audio stream (the video stream is fairly fast). This is unacceptable, but to make matters worse, the truth is that it's closer to 15 seconds with the best settings I could find. There is also no way to alert on sound (only motion) with the suggested ip-camera streaming app.It's just a Y-cam with outdated firmware and crappy support. The Y-cam itself goes for much less than half the cost of this, and has equivalent functionality.I have a masters in computer science and it took me a long time to set up.Since it's a crappy product, even purchasing the equivalent Y-cam which is much less expensive is not something that makes sense. Find another IP camera with night vision and you will have a superior baby monitor.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy!
Reviews.Author: Lars Melodia
Reviews.Content: Poor customer service.  Drains your phone battery as you are using throughout the night.  Picture quality was decent.  I would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: Recommend only if you have an interest in driving yourself INSANE.
Reviews.Author: Chrisotpher R. Sabat
Reviews.Content: I'm a smart enough guy.  I can figure most things out when it comes to electronic devices, but this this thing was a disaster.  I purchased it because our video baby monitor (and most video baby monitors) was destroying our Wifi.  I thought this would help, but it was infuriating.  The manual (if you want to call it that) was horrible and when I finally got it to work it looked terrible, kept losing it's connection and there was no decent application included with it.  In fact, there are NO good apps for this thing for the iPhone.  Truth is, I couldn't trust it which is the point of a baby monitor, isn't it?PROS:It doesn't destroy your WiFi like most baby monitors.  But...CONS:Instruction manual is awful.Very difficult to install.WiFi connection is unstable.  Not reliable.Comes with no decent application for your iPhone.Camera is not wide angle.  Very narrow range.

Reviews.Title: IR light can damage eyes
Reviews.Author: M. Aaron
Reviews.Content: I don't own this cam, but I see a lot wrong with the concept and the price.I cringe at the thought of using IR lights on a sleeping baby.  Calling a cam a "baby cam" that uses IR is crazy to me.  I myself have used an IP cam with IR light and it nearly blinded me at a range of about 6 feet before I realized it can harm you, thankfully I recovered.  You see, the problem is the light is very bright, but you can't see it with your eyes, the human eye doesn't respond and thus doesn't normally contract and defend itself.  You don't realize you should close your eyes, put your hands over your eyes or turn away as you normally would with visible light that is bright and shining in your eyes.Some may want to argue this point, but I say if there's even a chance of hurting your baby or anyone else it's not worth it.  Save IR for outside surveillance.  Test it on yourself, about the same distance you want it at night with the IR lights on and look into it for 15 minutes and see how you feel.  Keep in mind you'll have it aimed at or near your baby all night every night.I would recommend getting a good low light cam without IR, maybe put a night light on near the baby.  Low, ambient light with a good, low-cost cam is what I would buy myself.I have looked at dozens of different brands and IP cams.  The best one I found with a decent picture and good viewing angle is the Edimax 3115 usually around $60-70, but sometimes they will go on sale for $40-50.  It doesn't have h.264 tho, and no IR (which is good for a baby cam), but the picture quality is great with enough light, 74 degree viewing angle, 1.3 megapixel image, and it's wireless N which is what you want unless you're doing some fancy POE setup.Here's a list of things you want in a good IP cam:- H.264 (unless you use software like Blue Iris to do it for you on your computer)- Viewing angle of 70 or greater- Megapixel sensor (makes a huge difference in image quality)- Wireless N or POE for ethernet runsRight now you can get cams with all of that in the $100-150 range.  There are some new ones coming out later this year and next year that should bring down the price and increase quality with all of those features.The cams usually come with basic software that may be enough for you, but if you want the best get Blue Iris (can be found on discount at Eb**).

ProductInfo.Features:
WiFi Baby 2.0 - 2013 Version: Monitor & Nanny Cam DVR | Video, Audio, Alerts on iPhone, iPad, Android, Mac or PC on WiFi or 3G/4G.  Anywhere. | American Company - Free US Based Support
New Powerful Chipset | Streams Exceptionally Smooth H.264 Video: Less Bandwidth & Higher Image Quality | WiFi "N" - Up to 5x WiFi Range 2x speed | Small, Sleek, (Just over 3" sq., 1" deep)
Apps: Simultaneous Video, Audio, Alerts up to 4 Cameras on screen | Zoom. Picture in Picture. Take a snapshot or record to your phone/tablet with just a click |  Compatible up to latest OS: iOS 7+ Android 4.0+, Mountain Lion, Windows 8
Built in "Nanny Cam" DVR, MicroSD Card slot for scheduled recording | No monthly fees, cloud service, server or account required. Password-protected and recording is handled by the camera itself
Night Vision viewing distance up to 20 feet | Listen to the Sound of Silence:  Microphone Eliminates White Noise - Hear only what's important - Your Baby
ProductInfo.Name: WiFi Baby 2.0 - Wireless iPhone, iPad, Android, Baby Monitor & Nanny Cam DVR. Video, Audio, Recording. Anywhere. (WFB2013)
